properties.name: Add

properties.name: ForceString

properties.name: Filters
properties.help: The OData filter for the list activity logs. If this argument is provided OData Filter Arguments will be ignored.

properties.name: MaxEvents
properties.help: The maximum number of records to be returned by the command.

properties.name: Select
properties.help: The list of event names.

properties.name: Caller
properties.help: The caller to look for when querying.

properties.name: CorrelationId
properties.help: The correlation id of the query.

properties.name: EndTime
properties.help: The end time of the query. In ISO format with explicit indication of timezone: 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z, 1970-01-01T00:00:00-0500. Defaults to current time.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: The resource group.

properties.name: ResourceId

properties.name: ResourceProvider

properties.name: StartTime
properties.help: The start time of the query. In ISO format with explicit indication of timezone: 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z, 1970-01-01T00:00:00-0500. Defaults to 1 Hour prior to the current time.

properties.name: Status

properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: Categories
properties.help: Space-separated categories of the logs. These categories are created as is convenient to the user. Some values are Write, Delete, and/or Action.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.name: Locations
properties.help: Space-separated list of regions for which Activity Log events should be stored.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the log profile.

properties.name: ServiceBusRuleId
properties.help: The service bus rule ID of the service bus namespace in which you would like to have Event Hubs created for streaming the Activity Log. The rule ID is of the format '{service bus resource ID}/authorizationrules/{key name}'.

properties.name: StorageAccountId
properties.help: The resource id of the storage account to which you would like to send the Activity Log.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: Days
properties.help: The number of days for the retention in days. A value of 0 will retain the events indefinitely.

properties.name: Enabled
properties.help: Whether the retention policy is enabled.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the log profile.

properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: Aggregation
properties.help: The list of aggregation types (space-separated) to retrieve.

properties.name: Dimension
properties.help: The list of dimensions (space-separated) the metrics are queried into.

properties.name: Filter
properties.help: A string used to reduce the set of metric data returned. eg. "BlobType eq '*'".

properties.name: Metadata
properties.help: Returns the metadata values instead of metric data.

properties.name: Metrics
properties.help: Space-separated list of metric names to retrieve.

properties.name: Namespace
properties.help: Namespace to query metric definitions for.

properties.name: Orderby
properties.help: The aggregation to use for sorting results and the direction of the sort. Only one order can be specified. Examples: sum asc.

properties.name: Top
properties.help: The maximum number of records to retrieve. Valid only if $filter is specified. Defaults to 10.

properties.help: Name or ID of the target resource.

properties.help: Target resource parent path, if applicable.

properties.help: Target resource type. Can also accept namespace/type format (Ex: 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines)').

properties.name: EndTime
properties.help: The end time of the query. In ISO format with explicit indication of timezone, 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z, 1970-01-01T00:00:00-0500. Defaults to the current time.

properties.name: Interval
properties.help: The interval of the metric query. In ISO 8601 duration format, eg "PT1M".

properties.name: StartTime
properties.help: The start time of the query. In ISO format with explicit indication of timezone, 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z, 1970-01-01T00:00:00-0500. Defaults to 1 Hour prior to the current time.

properties.help: Disable the activity log alert after it is created.

properties.name: AutoMitigate
properties.help: Automatically resolve the alert.

properties.name: Disabled
properties.help: Create the rule in a disabled state.

properties.name: EvaluationFrequency
properties.help: Frequency with which to evaluate the rule in "##h##m##s" format.

properties.name: Severity
properties.help: Severity of the alert from 0 (low) to 4 (high).

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Space-separated tags in 'key[=value]' format. Use "" to clear existing tags.

properties.name: WindowSize
properties.help: Time over which to aggregate metrics in "##h##m##s" format.

properties.name: AddAction
properties.help: Add an action group and optional webhook properties to fire when the alert is triggered.

properties.name: RemoveActions
properties.help: Space-separated list of action group names to remove.

properties.name: AddCondition
properties.help: Add a condition which triggers the rule.

properties.name: RemoveConditions
properties.help: Space-separated list of condition names to remove.

properties.name: Add
properties.help: Add an object to a list of objects by specifying a path and key value pairs.  Example: --add property.listProperty <key=value, string or JSON string>.

properties.name: ForceString
properties.help: When using 'set' or 'add', preserve string literals instead of attempting to convert to JSON.

properties.name: Remove
properties.help: Remove a property or an element from a list.  Example: --remove property.list <indexToRemove> OR --remove propertyToRemove.

properties.name: Set
properties.help: Update an object by specifying a property path and value to set.  Example: --set property1.property2=<value>.

properties.name: ActionGroup
properties.help: The names or the resource ids of the action groups to be added.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: Name of the activity log alerts.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: Name of resource group. You can configure the default group using `az configure --defaults group=&lt;name&gt;`.

properties.name: Reset
properties.help: Remove all the existing action groups before add new conditions.

properties.name: Strict
properties.help: Fails the command if an action group to be added will change existing webhook properties.

properties.name: WebhookProperties
properties.help: Space-separated webhook properties in 'key[=value]' format. These properties will be associated with the action groups added in this command.

properties.name: ActionGroup
properties.help: The names or the resource ids of the action groups to be added.
